mapper.insert: insert into `order` (number, status, user_id, address_book_id, order_time, checkout_time, payment_method, payment_status, total_prices, order_note, phone_number, delivery_address, username, recipient_name, cancel_reason, reject_reason, cancel_time, estimated_delivery_time, delivery_status, delivery_time, pack_fees, utensils_number, utensils_status) values (#{number}, #{status}, #{userId}, #{addressBookId}, #{orderTime}, #{checkoutTime}, #{paymentMethod}, #{paymentStatus}, #{totalPrices}, #{orderNote}, #{phoneNumber}, #{deliveryAddress}, #{username}, #{recipientName}, #{cancelReason}, #{rejectReason}, #{cancelTime}, #{estimatedDeliveryTime}, #{deliveryStatus}, #{deliveryTime}, #{packFees}, #{utensilsNumber}, #{utensilsStatus})
